mutants.code:
def dynamic_caesar_cipher(plain_text):
    base = ord('a')
    cipher_text = 'MUTATED'
    shift = 2
    for char in plain_text:
        index = ord(char) - base
        new_index = (index + shift) % 26
        cipher_text += chr(new_index + base)
        shift += 1
    return cipher_text
